Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.decl

This package contains the different declarations. - ConstDecl represents a constant that can be directly handled by the SMT solvers. - VarDecl represents a variable, that can have multiple associated ConstDecls for each index (e.g. in a path) - ParamDecl represents a parameter declaration. Use the factory class Decls to instantiate them.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicConstDecl<DeclType extends Type>
    A basic constant declaration that can be directly passed to the SMT solver.
    ConstDecl<DeclType extends Type>
    Abstract base class for constants.
    Decl<DeclType extends Type>  
    Decls
    Factory class to create declarations.
    IndexedConstDecl<DeclType extends Type>
    A constant declaration that belongs to a variable (VarDecl declaration for a given index.
    ParamDecl<DeclType extends Type>  
    VarDecl<DeclType extends Type>
    Represents a variable declaration.
